trigger_event: On every push to a feature branch
success_criteria: Linter passes. Unit test coverage for changed files > 85% (REQ-1-052). All unit tests pass. SAST scan (CodeQL) reports zero new critical or high severity issues (REQ-1-048).
failure_action: Block pull request merge. Notify developer via GitHub Checks.
business_impact: Prevents basic errors and security flaws from entering the main codebase.

trigger_event: After successful merge to main branch
success_criteria: All integration tests pass. Software Composition Analysis (SCA via Snyk/npm audit) reports zero critical or high severity vulnerabilities in third-party dependencies (REQ-1-048). Docker image builds successfully.
failure_action: Fail the build. Notify development team via Slack/email.
tools_used: Supertest, Jest, Snyk, Docker, GitHub Actions
business_impact: Prevents integration issues and vulnerable dependencies from being deployed.

success_criteria: Critical path E2E test suite (Cypress) passes with 100% success rate. Smoke test against the deployed 'green' environment passes. Automated accessibility scan (Axe) reports zero new critical violations (REQ-1-034). Container vulnerability scan (Trivy) passes (REQ-1-048).
failure_action: Abort deployment. Trigger rollback if traffic was partially switched. Notify on-call engineer.
business_impact: Prevents critical, user-facing bugs from reaching production.
